story.book.view

Class StoryInfoActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • story.book.view.StoryInfoActivity

  • public class StoryInfoActivity
extends Activity
    Activity that allows the user to view the information of their story and then view the story. When the user is in the Online Stories, this activity will allow them to download the story that they are viewing.
    Author:
    Nancy Pham-Nguyen, Vina Nguyen
